subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|韋駄天|いだてん}}: [[w:Skanda (Buddhism)|Skanda (Buddhism)]]; [[fast]]-[[footed]] [[person]]
* {{ja-r|帝釈天|^たいしゃくてん}}: {{w|Śakra (Buddhism)|Śakra}}, [[lord]] of the {{w|Deva (Buddhism)|Devas}} and an important figure in [[Japanese]] [[Buddhism]]
* {{ja-r|天麩羅|てんぷら}}: [[tempura]]
* {{ja-r|任天堂|^にんてんどう}}: [[w:Nintendo|Nintendo]] ([[gaming]] [[company]])
* {{ja-r|毘沙門天|^びしゃもんてん}}: {{w|Vaiśravaṇa}}, one of the {{w|Four Heavenly Kings}} and an important figure in [[Japanese]] [[Buddhism]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|あま}}

From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=あま|-}}. A bound form only appearing in compounds.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref> Compare the formation of {{m|ja|目|tr=ma|pos=bound form in compounds}} and {{m|ja|目|tr=me|pos=standalone form}}, {{m|ja|手|tr=ta|pos=bound form in compounds}} and {{m|ja|手|tr=te|pos=standalone form}}.

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|あま}}

# {{lb|ja|archaic|sort=あま}} the [[sky]], the [[heavens]]
# the area above a [[kitchen]] [[stove]]:
## where the [[smoke]] collects in an old kitchen using a [[wood-burning stove]]
## a [[shelf]] or [[shelves]] above the stove
# {{lb|ja|archaic|sort=あま}} [[heaven]]

subSections.title: Derived terms
Etymology 2
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|あめ}}

# {{lb|ja|archaic|sort=あめ}} the [[sky]], the [[heavens]]
# {{lb|ja|archaic|sort=あめ}} [[heaven]]
# {{lb|ja|archaic|sort=あめ}} the [[roof]] of a [[palace]]

subSections.title: Idioms
Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=on|てん}}

From {{bor|ja|ltc|sort=てん|-}} {{ltc-l|天|sky; heavens}}. Compare modern {{cog|cmn|-}} reading ''tiān''.
